content:
I wrote a bunch about use cases involving identifying which allocator you're working with, and possible solutions to it. Mostly just trying to get some thoughts on the problem space down â€” most of the thoughts I had there were bad.

I did it in hackmd to support inline comments, if any are interested: https://hackmd.io/8V_l7KCjRsO1kDHlYN1gLQ
@Thom Chiovoloni I've added a few comments.
